thread.title: Milo Yiannopoulos Book Dropped by Simon & Schuster
thread.title_full: Milo Yiannopoulos Book Dropped by Simon & Schuster

author: Tim Kenneally
title: Milo Yiannopoulos Book Dropped by Simon & Schuster
text:
Milo Yiannopoulos Book Dropped by Simon & Schuster 
Decision comes after shocking comments by Breitbart editor surfaced over the weekend Tim Kenneally | February 20, 2017 @ 2:42 PM Getty 
Conservative firebrand Milo Yiannopoulos’ book “Dangerous” won’t be coming out — at least not via Simon & Schuster. 
“After careful consideration, Simon & Schuster and its Threshold Editions imprint have cancelled publication of Dangerous by Milo Yiannopoulos,” a spokeswoman for the pubisher told TheWrap on Monday, after several controversial comments from the Brietbart editor surfaced over the weekend. 
The book was to be released next month. However, comments made by Yiannopoulos caused a huge uproar over the weekend. On Sunday a video surfaced in which Yiannopoulos said some relationships between adults and 13-year-olds are consensual. He also joked that being molested had made him good at oral sex. 
More to come..
